# fullScreenDisallowsTiling

**Type Property**

The window doesn’t support being a full-screen tile window, but may support being a full-screen window.

## Declaration

```swift
static var fullScreenDisallowsTiling: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

For more information about full-screen tile window support, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/CollectionBehavior-swift.struct/fullScreenAllowsTiling].

## Full screen

- **fullScreenPrimary**: The window can enter full-screen mode.
- **fullScreenAuxiliary**: The window displays on the same space as the full screen window.
- **fullScreenNone**: The window doesn’t support full-screen mode.
- **fullScreenAllowsTiling**: The window can be a secondary full screen tile even if it can’t be a full screen window itself.
